actions.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-215, by Mr. Simpson.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 175.

official_title: Making appropriations for the Department of the Interior, environment, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026

titles.title: Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
